name: Penguin Cleaner
description:
Broken Pickaxe Jam $38 price

Hosted by RadRize, ivanrecioo, Scholar.Of.Doom, electrosadness

Theme: 

Dirty and Clean

BurterButterBeans Studio presents: "Penguin Cleaner" 🐧🛁

Featuring Penguins from "Adventure Time", Gunther stars in 8 different penguin forms:

angry blue Gunther😠, cat Gunther🐱, cowboy Gunther🤠, gangster Gunther😎, magic Gunther🧙‍♂️, nerdy Gunther🤓, saiyan Gunther🥷, and just plain old Gunther🐧! 😂

Stop the bombs from exploding the little penguins and reach your way to the top by meeting the minimum quota!

3 Fun Levels

Auto-saving included

Funny sound effects

Available on Web, Windows, Mac, and Android!

~Have fun
